stories.title: Display Tooltip on Hover
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a tooltip when I hover over a button so that I can receive additional information.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the button with text 'Hover me to see' is visible, When I hover over the button, Then a tooltip with the text 'You hovered over the Button' should appear.

stories.title: Verify Tooltip Visibility
stories.description: As a user, I want to ensure the tooltip only appears on hover so that it does not obstruct the UI.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I am not hovering over the button, Then the tooltip with the text 'You hovered over the Button' should not be visible.
